scripts.render:build: bash -lc "set -e;   if [ ! -s package-lock.json ]; then     echo \"[build] no or empty lockfile — creating with npm install --package-lock-only\";     npm install --package-lock-only --include=dev;   fi;   if ! npm ci --include=dev; then     echo \"[build] npm ci failed — falling back to npm install\";     npm install --include=dev;   fi;   npx prisma generate --schema=prisma/schema.prisma "
